name: The Quest for a Carrot
description:
The Quest for a Carrot is a Puzzle RPG about a collapsing economy. Have a nice time solving puzzles in dungeons to afford a simple carrot.

Due to problems with the king, most of the kingdom is in economic chaos. Taxes were a bit too high. This, along with adventurers finding thousands of gold coins within dungeons, causes shop keepers to need to increase prices to stay afloat.

This game was made for Gamemaker Toolkit 2020.

Controls:

WASD on keyboard/pad buttons on  controller to move

enter/bottom face button on controller to interact with things

Asset Packs used in the production of this game:

8BIT CanariPack TopDown
https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-8bit-topdown
